title: Write multiOmicDataSet Properties
description: Export the contents of a multiOmicDataSet (sample metadata, feature annotation, counts, and analyses) to a directory of CSV/RDS files for downstream use or inspection.

inputDatasets.description: File path to the input multiOmicDataSet (MOO) RDS file.

parameters.description: Directory where properties will be written (sample_metadata.csv, feature_annotation.csv, counts/, analyses/).
